creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Margaret and Harold Sims
description: irregular, oval form on three small feet; deep incision just below neck; long, narrow neck; small mouth; pinkish in color with earth tones, gray, and brown glazes
medium: Stoneware with natural Ash-Glaze Deposits and Fire Markings
title: Flask (tokkuri)
